trans-unit.source: Represents an error that occurs in redirection processing.
trans-unit.target: 表示在重定向处理时发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"></xref>, and array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref>，并将数组<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"></xref>, inner exception, and array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>具有指定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref>，内部异常和数组<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> class with the specified message, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"></xref>, and array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>使用指定的消息中，类<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref>，并将数组<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the current exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> with the specified message string, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"></xref>, inner exception, and array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>替换为指定的消息字符串， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref>，内部异常和数组<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref> associated with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>.
The redirection duration associated with the exception.
trans-unit.target: 与异常关联的重定向持续时间。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>使用有关异常的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref>对象与当前关联<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The redirection scope associated with the exception.
trans-unit.target: 与异常关联的重定向范围。

trans-unit.source: The redirection type associated with the exception.
trans-unit.target: 与异常关联的重定向类型。
